transArray.content: The facilities and services are good. The room is a bit small. I live close to the road. The sound insulation effect is good, but it is still a bit noisy at night.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and giving us the opportunity to serve you. First of all, thank you for your recognition of our service and hygiene. We apologize for not being able to give you a satisfactory stay! Affected by the opening time of the hotel, there is indeed some gap between the hotel room space and the newly opened store. Although the hotel is small, the facilities in the room are complete, and the supporting facilities in the room can meet your daily living needs. Since the hotel is located on the West Fourth Ring Road, We are deeply sorry for the impact on you. The room is equipped with double-glazed glass, which can be closed tightly to reduce noise. Anti-noise earplugs are also available at the front desk for guests to use at any time! If you have any questions while in the store, you can contact our staff at any time, we will be waiting for you 24 hours a day! Once again we express our deep apologies and hope that you can see our efforts and progress when you have the opportunity to stay again. We look forward to your every visit and wish you all the best! Hotel General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
